isLive.description: Indicates whether the card was activated. Initially set to `false` when the card is created. The card is printed and shipped to the user. It changes to `true` once the user activates the card using the "publicToken".

isPinTryExceeds.description: Entering 3 erroneous PIN codes in a row blocks the PIN and sets the "isPinTryExceeds" to `true`.

configuredLimit.description: The limit that the user has configured, e.g. the parent decided that the child is not allowed to withdraw more than 100€ per week from the ATM

maximumLimit.description:
The maximum limit that Bling/Treezor/Regulators think is appropriate, e.g. the maximum slider value in the app.

Sometimes that maximum limit can be increased by contacting the support. If approved, this value will be increased.

V2FamilyPlanSubscriptionScheduledChanges.description:
The changes that will be applied to the subscription in the
  next billing cycle. Note that either of the tier or the billing cycle can be null at the same time.

nextBillingAt.description: The date when the next billing will take place. It is null if the subscription is canceled.

billingPeriodStartedAt.description: The date when the current billing period started. It is null if the subscription is in trial.

billingPeriodEndsAt.description: The date when the current billing period ends. It is null if the subscription is in trial.

V2CardSubscriptionScheduledChanges.description: The changes that will be applied to the subscription in the next billing cycle.

nextBillingAt.description: The date when the next billing will take place. It is null if either the subscription is canceled or is an inclusive one.

billingPeriodStartedAt.description: The date when the current billing period started. It is null if the subscription is in trial.

billingPeriodEndsAt.description: The date when the current billing period ends. It is null if the subscription is in trial.

total.description: The total available within the tier; null if it is unlimited.

familyPlanSubscriptionUpsell.description:
Creates a new subscription if none exists,
  upgrades if already subscribed, and fails if the tier doesn't match
  the current family plan subscription state.

Creates a new subscription if none exists,
  upgrades if already subscribed, and fails if the tier doesn't match
  the current family plan subscription state.

cta.description: The CTA for the contracts submitted by the user is nullable if it is policed

post.summary: Activates the card of the user

get.summary: Find all the cards of a user

post.summary: Lock the card of the user

get.summary: Get the card and the information about the limits

patch.summary: Change the options of a specific card

objectBy.description: The user ID of the third-person if the document is confirmed on behalf of them

400.description: Indicates the provided request body is invalid

200.description: Returns the subscriptions for the given family.

post.summary: Resets the unread counter for the support chat to 0.

requestBody.description: The body should be explicitly empty.

204.description: Indicates that the counter was successfully resetted.

taskId.summary: Identifies the task whose history should be modified

requestBody.description: Should contain a date (format: **YYYY-MM-DD**) and a status (markedAsDone, undoMarkedAsDone, done)

204.description: Indicates that the history was modified.

403.description: Indicates that the modification was not processable due to missing permissions.

404.description: Indicates that the task whose history should be modified could not be found.

409.description: Indicates that the task could not be modified as it was not in an appropriate state.

get.summary: Retrieves and updates codes that a family+ user needs for the ubiMaster feature

200.description: Contains the bling code and the family code for ubiMaster

get.summary: Calculates the limits statistics for a particular card
V1: Calculates the general limits statistics
V2: Calculates the general limits statistics using user-tags

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The password reset token from the email link

200.description: All the tag defintions are in the tagDefinitions field.

tagDefinitions.description: Used to disable the rmc check for mobile onboarding for a user
Used to adjust allowed payin limit for a user
Used to adjust allowed payin limit for a user

200.description: All the tags that the user has.
IDs of users who have the specified tag is under userIds field.

requestBody.description: Add/remove a tag to/from a user

201.description: Updated tags the user now has is in tags field of the response body.

200.description: Contains unpaid invoices of all contracts that are associated with the authenticated user

requestBody.description: Contains an ID to identify the contract to delete.

201.description: An empty object that indicates that the operation was successful.

200.description: Describes whether a remediation is required (kycRemediationRequired) and how urgent the remediation is (type)

requestBody.description: Contains the data which should be checked during the remediation.

201.description: Indicates that the user input for the remediation was submitted successfully.

requestBody.description: Contains the data which should be checked during the remediation.

201.description: Indicates that the user input for the remediation was submitted successfully.

requestBody.description: Contains tax residences of the user.

201.description: Indicates that the update was successful.

recommendedCompanies.description: The UUIDs of the recommended companies for this category

companies.description: The UUIDs of the other companies for this category, sorted by name

content.description: The content for the booking screen for this category. Missing fields fallback to the default content. Therefore, all fields are required.

tileHeader.description: The URL of the tile header

cta.description: The CTA for the suggested contracts is not nullable

schema.description: The id of the contract. It will be used to upload the contract files.

tileHeader.description: The URL of the tile header

cta.description: The CTA for the suggested contracts is not nullable
